scripts.report: npx allure-commandline generate ./allure-results --clean && npx allure-commandline open ./allure-report
scripts.run:all:headless: npm run clean:allure && npm run test:headless && npm run report || npm run report
scripts.run:all:headed: npm run clean:allure && npm run test:headed && npm run report || npm run report
scripts.run:manual:headless: npm run clean:allure && npm run test:manual --headless && npm run report || npm run report
scripts.run:manual:headed: npm run clean:allure && npm run test:manual --headed && npm run report || npm run report
scripts.run:html:headed: npm run clean:html && npm run test:html:headed
scripts.run:html:headless: npm run clean:html && npm run test:html:headless
